title: Scott Johnson Farm Services business redirection auction | March 18 2015 | Purple Wave

tasks.task: Participate in an auction to purchase farm equipment.
subtasks: Browse the available items for sale.
Select three 2013 Macdon M205 wind rovers.
Consider tractors and trailers for purchase.

tasks.task: Bid on the selected equipment before the auction ends on March 18th.
subtasks: Submit bids through the Purple Wave website.
Bid competitively to purchase the desired equipment.
